IntroSection.name: Ranilo Pastidio
IntroSection.short_intro: I enjoy building things for the web3.

AboutSection.desc: Innovative and results-driven software engineer with over 7 years of experience spanning blockchain, full-stack, and enterprise development across Southeast Asia and the US. Adept at architecting, deploying, and securing Web3 applications and smart contracts on EVM-compatible chains, with a proven track record of optimizing backend and frontend systems for high performance, reliability, and user engagement. Demonstrated expertise in Java, Solidity, .NET, React, and cloud technologies, complemented by a strong foundation in computer science from the National University of Singapore. Passionate about delivering robust, scalable solutions and driving continuous improvement through thoughtful engineering and security best practices.
